---
title: "default.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file contains default configuration settings for a software application, likely named Flipt. It defines various aspects of the application's behavior, including logging, user interface, analytics, CORS settings, server configuration, metrics, storage, diagnostics, database, and metadata options.

## Symbols

### `log`
#### Description
Configures logging settings for the application.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the log level to INFO
- Uses console encoding for logs
- Sets the gRPC log level to ERROR

### `ui`
#### Description
Defines user interface settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the default theme to "system"

### `analytics`
#### Description
Configures analytics-related settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the buffer flush period to 10 seconds

### `cors`
#### Description
Configures Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Disables CORS by default
- Allows all origins ("*")
- Specifies allowed headers, including custom headers for Fern and Flipt

### `server`
#### Description
Defines server configuration settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the host to 0.0.0.0 (all interfaces)
- Configures HTTP port to 8080
- Configures HTTPS port to 443
- Configures gRPC port to 9000

### `metrics`
#### Description
Configures metrics collection settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Enables metrics collection
- Uses Prometheus as the exporter

### `storage`
#### Description
Specifies the storage type for the application.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the storage type to "database"

### `diagnostics`
#### Description
Configures diagnostic settings for the application.

#### Internal Logic
- Enables profiling

### `db`
#### Description
Configures database-related settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the database URL to a local SQLite file
- Configures a maximum of 2 idle connections
- Enables prepared statements

### `meta`
#### Description
Defines metadata and telemetry settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Enables checking for updates
- Enables telemetry

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| log.level | string | INFO | Sets the general logging level |
| log.encoding | string | console | Specifies the log encoding format |
| log.grpc_level | string | ERROR | Sets the logging level for gRPC |
| ui.default_theme | string | system | Defines the default UI theme |
| analytics.buffer.flush_period | string | "10s" | Sets the analytics buffer flush period |
| cors.enabled | boolean | false | Enables or disables CORS |
| cors.allowed_origins | list | ["*"] | Specifies allowed origins for CORS |
| cors.allowed_headers | list | [various headers] | Specifies allowed headers for CORS |
| server.host | string | 0.0.0.0 | Sets the server host |
| server.http_port | integer | 8080 | Sets the HTTP port |
| server.https_port | integer | 443 | Sets the HTTPS port |
| server.grpc_port | integer | 9000 | Sets the gRPC port |
| metrics.enabled | boolean | true | Enables or disables metrics collection |
| metrics.exporter | string | prometheus | Specifies the metrics exporter |
| storage.type | string | database | Sets the storage type |
| diagnostics.profiling.enabled | boolean | true | Enables or disables profiling |
| db.url | string | file:/tmp/flipt/flipt.db | Sets the database URL |
| db.max_idle_conn | integer | 2 | Sets the maximum number of idle database connections |
| db.prepared_statements_enabled | boolean | true | Enables or disables prepared statements |
| meta.check_for_updates | boolean | true | Enables or disables checking for updates |
| meta.telemetry_enabled | boolean | true | Enables or disables telemetry |

This configuration file provides a comprehensive set of default settings for the application, covering various aspects of its operation and behavior. It allows for easy customization of logging, server settings, database configuration, and more.
